```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidybayes)
library(rstan)
library(rstanarm)
library(bayesplot)
library(bayesrules)
library(broom.mixed)
library(pracma)
hotel <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yiyangshi-hub/STAT454-Project/main/hotel_bookings.csv")
```

```{r}
# random sample 1000 rows from the big dataframe 'hotel'
set.seed(123)
hotel_sub <- sample_n(hotel, 1000)
```

```{r}
hotel_sub%>%
  head()
```

```{r}
set.seed(84735)
logistic_model_1 <- stan_glm(
  is_canceled ~. , data = hotel_sub,
  family = binomial,
  chains = 4, iter = 5000*2, seed = 84735, refresh = 0)
```

```{r}
summary(logistic_model_1)$coefficients
```
